page.title: 09MY HOME LIFE!
page.content: My home is great, but often a bit of a madhouse! I live with my Gran and Grandpa, Mum, Dad and sister Rachel. We have a dog and a cat, not to mention a goldfish! Both my sister and I have many hobbies. Rachel plays the French Horn and Piano and is a member of various bands and orchestras. I play the Violin, Piano and Percussion. Grandpa is also a great Pianist, so you can guess that ours is not the quietest of households! Gran is great fun, but she does have her peculiarities! She adores gardening and spends most of her time in the garden (don't tell anyone, but I think she talks to her plants!). Both my parents are teachers (need I say more?). Life is never dull in the Madman, I mean Hardman! family!
